Html:

well, i save it in Excel2007 and don't see figures (like white circle)

what i do wrong? sorry for me English
I'm not going to download an .exe file, which is what your link is directing me to

Well, I do not know. You do not know how to use sendspace? There's a file 1.xls

http://depositfiles.com/files/4bgpxtisn

I don't know what's happening with the Excel5 save, and (as you point out) the formatted circle is lost when saving using Excel2007. I have no idea why, and any solution is going to take months rather than hours. suggest you use COM instead to handle this complex formatting, especially as your workbook also contains macros.
